ygData.subject: Wolf vs. Horse
ygData.msgSnippet: Wildfire: They played a game of mind wars. She chased him, then he chased her. It went on like this for hours. They played their aggressive game of beast tag.

Subject: Wolf vs. Horse

From: wilddance_mare@...

Wildfire:




They played a game of mind wars. She chased him, then he chased her. 
It went on like this for hours. They played their aggressive game of 
beast tag. Wildfire was a pure pshyic, but Rowdy Wolf had 
connections. She kicked her hooves out when he got too close.

She made the forest look darker with her flash of images and made him 
loose his direction a few times. She made her warnings to stay away 
from the Predacons. She showed that they were her race and they could 
be just as deadly as her. 

They went on with their mind war.
